lead_paragraph: The United States kept their Copa America hopes alive by thrashing Costa Rica 4-0 in Chicago on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Hammer Costa Rica to Keep Copa America Hopes Alive
headline.main: U.S. Hammer Costa Rica to Keep Copa America Hopes Alive
